column6: Romance is brewing between X23 and...well, you'll have to read to find out! But is it unrequited or unwise for heroes to get tangled in love? The battle inside the man known as Shogun is now risking the lives of his teammates and friends...looks like evil may prevail? What does that mean for the overall mission at hand? Fantomelle and Culpepper have been fighting tooth and claw for an unknown benefactor, risking their lives for everything...but who are they risking it all for?
column8: | penciller (cover):Kris Anka | writer:Ray Fawkes | writer:Charles Soule | artist:Ariela Kristantina
